validations.validation_error: File size must be less than 16 MB.

task_template_presets.title: Features of the Invitation Card Maker

items.title: Jumpstart Your Vision with AI Inspiration
items.content: You know the mood you want—romantic, whimsical, maybe even a bit cheeky—but getting started feels like staring at a blank page. The invitation card maker turns your ideas into AI-generated visuals in seconds, offering elegant styles and fresh layouts. This invitation card maker helps you go from concept to creation without the creative block.

items.title: Design Without Design Skills
items.content: Polished appearance matters, but not everyone has the time—or tools—to learn professional design software. The invitation card maker makes that irrelevant by bringing beautiful, camera-ready invitation cards to life through simple text or image prompts. This intuitive invitation card maker empowers anyone to be their own visual designer, no software, no stress.

items.title: Let Emotion Lead the Design
items.content: You want your invitation to speak from the heart—not feel like a copy-paste job. With the invitation card maker, you can create visuals that echo your tone, your vibe, your story. Whether it's playful or poetic, the invitation card maker channels your intent into visuals that feel personal, not pre-fab. Let the feelings drive the format.

task_template_presets.title: Why Use an Invitation Card Maker

items.title: Express Your Vision
items.content: Bring your unique celebration to life with an invitation card maker that lets your personality shine through every font, color, and image—turning your ideas into a design that truly reflects who you are.

items.title: Save Time Creatively
items.content: Skip the stress of design logistics and focus on the fun—an invitation card maker gives you fast, imaginative options to craft something personal, even when time is short and memories are waiting.

items.title: Celebrate Every Detail
items.content: From whimsical birthdays to elegant weddings, an invitation card maker helps you highlight the heart of your event by customizing even the smallest elements, ensuring your invites feel meaningful and memorable.

task_template_presets.title: Best Invitation Card Maker You Can Try

items.title: Free to use
items.content: Unlock powerful art tools at zero cost, making it easy for anyone to create and innovate without barriers.

items.title: Fully Private
items.content: Your creations and data stay confidential, guaranteeing your artistic work remains safe and secure.

items.title: Easy to Start
items.content: Built for ease of use, so you can jump in and thrive—no matter your skill level or experience.

task_template_presets.title: How to Use the Invitation Card Maker

items.title: Open the generator
items.content: Click our invitation card tool. You don't need to download or install anything on your device.

items.title: Add prompt or image
items.content: Describe or upload the image your want to turn into invitation card artwork from your device or your Gallery.

items.title: Wait
items.content: The Image Generation process will start automatically. Simply wait a moment for your image to be generated or restyled.

task_template_presets.title: Introduction to AI Invitation Card Maker
task_template_presets.introduction:
The invitation card maker is an AI-powered design tool that helps you generate elegant, ready-to-use visuals for any celebration. Whether you're crafting invites for a wedding, milestone birthday, or baby shower, this smart invitation card maker brings your ideas to life with speed, style, and personalized flair.
When your vision is vivid but your design skills stall, this invitation card maker opens a world of inspired possibilities. No need for fancy software or hours of tweaking—just words, and the magic begins. Your aesthetic meets AI intuition, and suddenly, you're not just planning a party... you're setting the tone for a memory.
